title: Select character lockin error
body: Locked in character and the timer kept going and the lock in button was grayed out

replies.body: I just did two days ago, so I will prolly have to reinstall lol next.

This may be caused by corrupt files in your League directory. I'd recommend running a quick repair to take care of any problematic files. You can do this by slapping that cog icon in the top-right of your client, then hitting the *Initiate Full Repair*.

Let me know if this helped!
